column5: As of April 1 the pre-entry test will no longer be required for fully vaccinated travelers. https://www.canada.ca/en/public-health/news/2022/03/government-of-canada-will-remove-pre-entry-test-requirement-for-fully-vaccinated-travellers-on-april-1.html
Thatâ€™s great news. One less hoop to have to jump through. Hopefully between now and Early June several other hoops are removed as well.
That is great news. Will the US reciprocate?
Do we still need the ArrivCan app?

Yes. Check out the link stjoeguy posted, everything you need to know is there. Thanks for posting that. Highly recommend that everyone gets border crossing info directly from Canadian government websites or speaking directly with the CBSA. Just going off what other people write on forums or social media can lead to a lot of hearsay, rumors, and unnecessary frustration.
The us does not have any testing for coming into the us via foot or vehicle
